column1: Smoque BBQ////The place is a bit cramped
column2: and their system for organizing who sits when is effective and charming. However
column3: I have not sat down to eat at Smoque for some time
column4: preferring instead to phone in my order and skip the occasionally long line. It also is not a place to linger
column5: unless you want to heartlessly deny barbecue goodness to the people in line.
